content.label:
I’m a therapist and was appalled to hear that this app exists as I knew there would be no way of verifying user’s claims of men they’ve dated. It seems far too easy to use as a platform for bullying them. 

Well it finally happened. A client of mine came in looking void of life after learning their lifelong friend shot himself in the head after a former girlfriend and her friend posted horrendous accusations of him. Accusations that people closest to him can verify were untrue. I hope his family pursues legal action against this poorly thought out app. Nice job tech bros.
I liked this app at first. I’m not paying $14 per month at that to use it. No thanks

Everyone’s talking about this app and about the guys but why haven’t heard about the waitlist it puts you on and you can’t do nothing with the app just take storage until you get approved??? That’s kinda dumb.

i looked up a name and 3 profiles wouldn’t load. every other one did but those 3 didn’t and the comments seemed like one of those 3 was the one i was looking for. i restarted my phone, logged out, tried searching again, exited the app, etc and literally just those 3 profiles wouldn’t load. every name i searched after was fine and all posts on my home were fine too. really pmtfo
it hasn’t accepted me and it’s been 2 days, who can i contact?
This app is filled with fake grudge holding women or just simply jealous woman lying about some men. It’s a good app.l but a lot of jealous women are ruing it
long wait..
i got banned even though i didn’t break any of the rules , there’s girls on there letting there guy friends use the app to post females to get tea on them, but yet i get banned for no reason
They been saying I skipped the waitlist and everything n that it should only b a few hours ITS BEEN WEEKS I can’t even invite anyone so I can join faster.
App is cool
You can’t search unless you pay $20/month. You’ll have to scroll through 1,000’s of people before you find who you’re looking for.
They do not only post men on there like they are supposed to

This app is a safe zone for all women. Anyone worried about this app both female and male should be triple checked cause that means they’d be snooping around. I hope apps like this and more features open up in the future, would make the world a safer zone n a better place.
This app is where people go to bully men because they are narcissists who think anyone who doesent agree with the wrong they do is bad
Guys are committing suicide cause of this app. That girls are going posting guys making up lies for no reason.
This app is a decent app but it’s becoming more than a dating advice app people on here have and could spread lies to people and I feel the app needs to stay the way it was made
The app is offensive to some and useful to others. I’ve seen a few in which reputations are tarnished by bitter ex’s. There’s no way to have posts removed just reported.
Just joined, looks good!

This app is allowing actual legal ramifications for what some of these people are saying. I’m not saying the app should be taken down but the comments should filtered to where people can not make life altering comments without their name attached to it.

still waiting to be accepted.. i skipped the long wait by sending it to a couple contacts yet that seemed to do nothing. it’s been a few days now and i’ve tried deleting a redownloading the app and still, nothing.
I still can't get an approval after like 2 months

This is  dedicated to, basically, libel. It’s written defamation, attempting to damage the reputations or lives of individuals who have somehow wronged the people submitting the posts.  I cant wait for people to start filing lawsuits and getting this app shutdown

I didn’t even do nothing wrong someone exposed me for no reason like I get yall are tryna keep women safe but that also gives an excuse for some immature women and men to spread rumors and make up lies and just be all up in peoples business either yall gotta take this app down or change sum things on bc that’s crazy I don’t even have the app and heard about this like whoever it was that made app what you smoking on yall over ruin peoples lives im not saying some people don’t deserve it but the rest of us that’s just tryna live our lives don’t deserve that I’m a good person for real
Y’all got some liars on this app kid you not
terrible app only girl who have this app are unconfident low lifers we are bored enough to bring guys down and talk bad about there name for no reason
Hello ladies! I love the way that women are able to have a safe space and be transparent about their past and how men have treated them. I also love that they have rules and regulations

Amazing app for girls, this app allows u to know who’s a red flag and who’s marriage material. Found my talking stage on their and found out he was a pedo so it’s rlly essential for girls bc yk men lie. Shout out to the creators for making a safe space for women!!
Awful app
I updated it and now it won’t load results when I enter any filter. Useless
You need to take this app down I have lies about me on here and I have become suicidal because of this
Was good up until it started not loading up for me 😭😭💔💔

Do not download the tea app. The tea app is made by hackers who take your money. You sit on the screen talking about they will let you in after they review your account to make sure you’re a woman for DAYS. While you do that, they take your information and steal your money from cashapp, navy federal, etc. Delete the app. I didn’t even get in before I got the news that they were hackers and stealing money. You can look this information up with solid proof. I would also like to add that this app is a huge defamation of character, which is illegal! Most of the information you will find on the app, is a bunch of lies. There’s a few things on there that are true, but most of it is made up slander. The people making up these lies and this app could be sued. This app needs to be taken down.

My friends saw that I was posted on the app. The person wrote nothing but slander against me, and my friends had to defend me on the app.

The app is a good concept, don’t get me wrong, but it can also lead people in the app to lie about others.
I love being able to keep women safe from all the bad men that exist in the world!!!!

Apps like this shouldn’t exist in my opinion anybody can say anything about anyone on here this is a New Age (The Dirty.com ) which was taken off of the internet and sued. Why must we bully people on the internet exactly? I think this app is going to cause a lot of lawsuits and issues if you ask me. I understand why it was made but idk just be careful! All you need is a group of people to hate on you and you will be posted and it may or may not be true. Sad world we live in
I mean it’s helpful to those who are getting played and it’s always good to call people out of that behavior!
I been waiting for a month like some review or let me start the process again
All women wed this app regardless of your age or relationship status.
I love this app. It helped me dodge a huge bullet.
Nothing but slander and defamation going on in this app.
App will get you hurt
I did not lie nor put bad comments on guys, I did try my best on helping girls figure there situation how could I get unblocked?

I tried to get onto the waiting list and also invited a friend so I could skip the waitlist. The app said it would take a couple of hours to review me. It’s been since Sunday and today is now Wednesday
Cyber bullying app
Helps women to know who and who not to date. Keeping women safe love
It won’t approve me?? Skipped the wait line days ago. Yet I’ve seen guys post that they got accepted? App has men all over in yet under disguise as women. Yet they won’t approve actual women….

For anyone who has been affected by this application, whose developers mask as a safety tool but in reality is an application made to defame men, you can take action. File a claim with Apple and look into your states laws. This is copyright infringement with intent to defame, which means if your picture is posted and YOU are the owner of that picture, they are distributing it with the intent to defame your character.
put the wrong age in once , deleted the app nd never let me re sign it
False accusations
